H0.text: What profession was Jean-Paul Marat, noted for his involvement in the French Revolution at the end of the 18th century. Politician

H1.text: What profession was Jean-Paul Marat, noted for his involvement in the French Revolution at the end of the 18th century. Revolutionary Leader

H2.text: What profession was Jean-Paul Marat, noted for his involvement in the French Revolution at the end of the 18th century. Physician

H3.text: What profession was Jean-Paul Marat, noted for his involvement in the French Revolution at the end of the 18th century. Journo

A4.text: Jean-Paul Marat was a French political theorist, physician, and scientist.

A5.text: Jean-Paul Marat was a journalist and politician during the French Revolution.

A7.text: L'Ami du peuple was edited by Jean-Paul Marat.
